entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mac Catalyst CMD+Q doesn't close application #5026
  • Running installed .NET MAUI Blazor app fails on Windows #5024
  • Maui's usage of Reflection to find op_Implicit operators is not trim-compatible #5023
  • Mac Catalyst Blazor WebView CMD+SHIFT+I doesn't open dev tools #5022
  • XamlC should optimize CornerRadiusTypeConverter and FontSizeConverter ConvertFromInvariantString #5018
  • Implicit styles not applied to underlying items depending on where they are set. #5016
  • OnIdiom issue with Windows #5014
  • Events for headset connection status. #5000
  • Make BindableProperty trim-compatible #4997

Closed

  • Update DualScreen controls to use new Window Jetpack on Android #1753
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • Blazor Hybrid WinForms apps give error if there's an ErrorBoundary #4502
  • Blazor WebView iOS Zoom Support #4996
  • MenuBar #4640
  • Using device styles throws an InvalidOperationException #4987
  • [Bug] Push to top using minus margin or TranslateY make CollectionView disappear #4686
  • [Bug] ControlTemplate isn't rendering #2302
  • Proposal: Remove Application.Properties #4864
  • [Bug] IntentFilter WebAuthenticator - Resources+NotFoundException appIcon #2902
  • button text does not display content！ #3902

PullRequests

Created

  • Loaded/Unloaded events and propagate Window #5027
  • Use TextHighlighter to implement background color for Span #5025
  • [dualscreen] project/nuget for Surface Duo and other Android foldables #5020
  • [shell] minor performance improvements #5013
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Remove FontImageExtension #5012
    area/Xaml </>, area/fonts 🅰️
  • Fix iOS CollectionView update when not visible #5011
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Remove unused ExportFontAttribute.EmbeddedFontResourceId property #5010
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/fonts 🅰️
  • Remove `DisableImplicitNamespaceImports` config #5009
  • Implement IBorder on Windows #5008
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Allow non-dot decimal separator in BindingExpression #5005
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Update SearchBar TextColor property if TraitCollection changes #5004
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, control-entry
  • [Android] Changes to avoid an EditText issue with RecyclerView scroll #5003
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] ClipRect in MauiScrollView Draw method #5002
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Update cursor visibility when IsReadOnly Property changes on Entry #5001
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, control-entry
  • Implement InputTransparent #4995

Merged

  • Revert "Hide Keyboard in Android Entry and Editor when back key is pressed #5019
  • Remove Application.Properties implementation #4976
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Don't set the text on android if value matches #4992

Updated

  • Make Maui.Core, Controls.Core, and Controls.Xaml Trimmable #5028
  • Map Controls.Picker.TextTransform #4967
    area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • Fix template build to use correct slashes on all platforms #4991
    area/templates 📄
  • Remove all usage of Device throughout the repo #4982
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Blazor] Align our Blazor Maui template with the Blazor RTM template #4922
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [iOS] Update DatePickerHandler and TimePickerHandler #3761
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • [Android] Implement pending focus management logic in Handlers #4914
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Remove unsupported targets in Device class #4491
    area/Xaml </>, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Android] Implement custom WebChromeClient in WebViewHandler #4826
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [iOS] Custom implementation in SearchBar IsEnabled property #4882
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Implement LineBreakMode property in ButtonHandler #4664
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [iOS] Add pending events and dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • Implement touch events in GraphicsView #3261
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/drawing ✏️
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
